about.title: About me
about.subtitle: A dedicated Front-end Developer based in Buenos Aires, Argentina
about.description: As a Junior Front-End Developer, I possess an impressive arsenal of skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Tailwind. I excel in designing and maintaining responsive websites that offer a smooth user experience. My expertise lies in crafting dynamic, engaging interfaces through writing clean and optimized code and utilizing cutting-edge development tools and techniques. I am also a team player who thrives in collaborating with cross-functional teams to produce outstanding web applications.

works.subtitle: Each project is a unique piece of development
works.textWork1: The design phase focuses on simplicity, employing a clean color palette and intuitive navigation. Imagery, carefully selected to resonate with cleanliness and professionalism, plays a pivotal role. A responsive layout ensures a seamless user experience across various devices.
works.textWork2: Designing a sleek landing page for a modern digital agency. Emphasizing contemporary aesthetics, it showcases innovation through engaging visuals and intuitive navigation, communicating professionalism and expertise.
